basics.name: Hieu Phan
basics.label: Research Scientist — AI / Machine Learning
basics.summary: Research scientist specializing in multimodal LLMs, knowledge distillation and continual learning. PhD (UoW), postdoc at AIML, industry experience in vision language model research.

work.name: Google
work.summary: Research on multimodal LLMs with improved visual perception for clinical and general applications.

work.summary: Built and deployed ML models (edge & cloud) for environmental monitoring; led projects with government endorsement.
